name: Stool Pigeon
description:
Stool Pigeon

You are the lead interrogator for the PCPD: the Pigeon City Police Department. Your job is to crack the really tough cases and get hard-boiled pigeons to squawk. You never even have to leave the interrogation room: you get handed files and perps all day long.

Ask pigeons pointed questions about the crime and watch them sweat. Get enough details right, and they're sure to crack.
